mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_GRADE,'0.0') AS MOVIE_GRADE, RNUM FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, MOVIE_GRADE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_NO IN (SELECT MOVIE_LIKE_NO FROM MOVIE_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID}) ORDER BY MOVIE_DATE) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
